snippet: Tesla, the maker of an electric automobile, trimmed its loss to $38 million on revenue of $431 million, compared with a loss of $111 million on revenue of $50 million a year ago.
abstract: Tesla Motors, electric automobile manufacturer, trims its third-quarter loss to $38 million on revenue of $431 million, compared with a loss of $111 million on revenue of $50 million a year ago.
lead_paragraph: Tesla, the maker of an electric automobile, trimmed its loss to $38 million on revenue of $431 million, compared with a loss of $111 million on revenue of $50 million a year ago.

headline.main: Tesla Posts Smaller Loss, but Shares Start to Temper
headline.print_headline: Tesla Posts Smaller Loss, But Shares Start to Temper
